name: Futanari Sex - Pool Party
description:
About the game
A visual novel about two attractive women enjoying a sunny day at a private swimming pool.
Everything takes a turn when Futanari Avery catches them fooling around in the water.
Visual Novel Description
Sofy and Karla are enjoying a sunny, relaxing day at a private swimming pool.
They are tanning, applying sunscreen on each other, and gossiping about the latest rumors.
When things are heating up, the two of them decide to cool off by taking a quick swim in the shiny blue water.
Karla, being a bit more confident and eager to try new things, as soon as she has the opportunity, begins to hit on Sofy.
The women start kissing and exploring each other’s bodies, little by little.
Right in the most interesting moment, Avery catches the two of them fooling around.
Avery is not a typical girl. She is hiding something special in her panties (or better said bikini).
What will Avery do? Will she enjoy the view from the distance or will she join the fun?
Let’s find out together…
